

fdframe
Functional Data Frame


#### Description 


This function is used to create multivariate functional data frame objects to be used in combination
with the functions in the package bigdatadist.
Usage
fdframe(t, Y)
#### Arguments 
t abscissa values at which observations took place.
Y matrix with functions in columns and observations in rows.

#### Examples 

t = 1:10; Y = cbind(sin(t),cos(t))
fdata = fdframe(t,Y)
plot(fdata, xlab='Time', ylab='')gmdepth
